title: Nerf Kha'Zix
body:
Dear Rito
        When i played with {{champion:54}}  in Jungle . When i saw {{champion:121}}  stole my Red then tried to kill him . {{champion:121}}  had  '' LOW HP '' and i had '' FULL HP '' . So , i thought his Q and E is normal or OK . But it's not . He killed me . . .{{item:3070}}     . 

So Nerf him , Rito
